entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Wynyard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 a.m. CST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 20 April 2023
